title: L'Oriento - Jourdan
typeOfFood: Buffet, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Lebanese, Syrian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Syrian Lebanese cuisine. The restaurant offers a buffet lunch (all you can eat, or pay by weight to take away): among the 20 dishes on the buffet, only one or two have meat and one or two have cheese, the rest happens to be vegan suitable. Staff is keen to answer any question.
